subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: With the surprising pair of Matt Besler and Omar Gonzalez in central defense Tuesday night against Mexico, the United States men’s team enhanced its chances of qualifying for the World Cup.
snippet: With the surprising pair of Matt Besler and Omar Gonzalez in central defense Tuesday night against Mexico, the United States men’s team enhanced its chances of qualifying for the World Cup.
